comment: Yeah! What Sheep-Dog said! We American citizens need to band together and put these Democrats in the gutter where they belong!

      :snt2 (o / obligate-01

                  :mod (c / citizen

                                    :op2 "States"))))
            :ARG2 (a / and
                  :op1 (b / band-01

                        :ARG1 (p2 / person

                                          :op1 "Democrat"))

                        :ARG1 p2
                        :ARG2 (g / gutter
